about-description: Si vous avez des suggestions ou des problèmes avec la fiche de personnage, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter.
coin-pouch-settings: Charge maximum Bourse : Mettre à 0 pour ignorer
email-us: Envoyez-nous vos commentaires ou questions par email
name: Nom:
no-spells: Vous ne pouvez pas lancer de sorts avec votre choix de classe ou d'espèce actuel.
submit-issue: Envoyer une demande de fonctionnalité ou un bug
title: Titre:
1W: Grinning Waxing - 50% chance of guardian undead ignoring the character's presence. (Though they act normally if provoked.)
1f: Grinning Full - +1 bonus to Saving Throws against the powers of undead monsters.
1w: Grinning Waning - +1 Attack bonus against undead monsters.
2W: Dead Waxing - +1 bonus to Attack and Damage Rolls the Round after killing a foe.
2f: Dead Full - If killed by non-magical means, the character returns to life after 1 Turn with 1 Hit Point. Their Constitution and Wisdom are permanently halved (to a minimum score of 3). This supernatural avoidance of death only takes effect once ever.
2w: Dead Waning - Undead monsters attack all others in the party before attacking the character.
3W: Beast Waxing - +2 bonus to Charisma (maximum 18) when interacting with dogs and horses.
3f: Beast Full - Wild animals attack all others in the party before attacking the character.
3w: Beast Waning - +1 Attack bonus against wolves and bears.
4W: Squamous Waxing - Effects of poison are delayed by 1 Turn.
4f: Squamous Full - +2 bonus to Saving Throws against the breath attacks and magical powers of wyrms and dragons.
4w: Squamous Waning - +1 Attack bonus against serpents and wyrms.
5W: Knight's Waxing - +2 bonus to Charisma (maximum 18) when interacting with nobles.
5f: Knight's Full - +1 AC bonus against attacks with metal weapons.
5w: Knight's Waning - On a tied Initiative roll when in melee with knights or soldiers, the character acts first, as if they had won.
6W: Rotting Waxing - +2 bonus to Charisma (maximum 18) when interacting with sentient fungi.
6f: Rotting Full - +2 AC bonus against attacks by fungal monsters.
6w: Rotting Waning - In the character's presence, fungal monsters suffer a -1 penalty to Attack and Damage Rolls.
7W: Maiden's Waxing - +2 bonus to Charisma (maximum 18) when interacting with demi-fey.
7f: Maiden's Full - +2 bonus to Saving Throws against charms and glamours.
7w: Maiden's Waning - +1 bonus to Attack and Damage Rolls against shape-changers and those cloaked with illusions.
8W: Witch's Waxing - When the character receives magical healing, they gain 1 additional Hit Point. This applies at most once per day to each type of magical healing (e.g. specific spell, Class trait, potion, etc.).
8f: Witch's Full - +1 bonus to Saving Throws against holy magic.
8w: Witch's Waning - +1 bonus to Attack Rolls against witches and holy spell casters.
9W: Robber's Waxing - +2 bonus to Charisma (maximum 18) when interacting with Chaotic mortals.
9f: Robber's Full - +1 AC bonus against attacks by Chaotic mortals, fairies, or demi-fey.
9w: Robber's Waning - +1 Attack bonus against Chaotic mortals, fairies, and demi-fey.
10W: Goat Waxing - +2 bonus to Charisma (maximum 18) when interacting with breggles (including crookhorns).
10f: Goat Full - Breggles (including crookhorns) attack all others in the party before attacking the character.
10w: Goat Waning - +1 Attack bonus against breggles (including crookhorns).
11W: Narrow Waxing - +2 bonus to Charisma (maximum 18) when interacting with fairies, but suffer a -1 penalty to all Saving Throws against fairy magic.
11f: Narrow Full - If the character is afflicted by a curse or a Geas spell, there is a 1-in-4 chance of the caster also being affected by their own magic.
11w: Narrow Waning - +1 Attack bonus against fairies and demi-fey.
12W: Black Waxing - +1 bonus to Search Checks to find secret doors.
12f: Black Full - +2 bonus to AC and Saving Throws when surprised.
12w: Black Waning - +2 bonus to Saving Throws versus illusions and glamours.
